text: developers are passionate about their
projects but don't want to spend extra
time or money
focusing on cloud management they need a
cloud platform that offers the fastest
easiest and most affordable way to get
up and running
amazon light sale does just that
as a one-stop shop to set up and manage
a variety of applications and websites
lightsail allows developers to do it all
with
instances databases in console
networking
and more it's powerfully simple with
click to launch blueprints designed to
provide customers with an easy to use
interface
while offering a rich feature set once
it's up and running it's simple to
operate and maintain applications
services and instances in a secure and
efficient way
it has a low set monthly price with
bundled plans that support common
business and application scenarios
these include all basic components such
as virtual servers
manage databases load balancers
networking
monitoring and alarms as customer needs
change and grow
they can upgrade to a different plan or
add resources such as databases and load
balancers
all for a fixed monthly price lightsail
is built on the world's leading cloud
platform
and its computing is based on the same
highly available and reliable aws cloud
infrastructure
used by over 1 million customers
worldwide
developers can now get projects up and
running as fast as possible
with an easy to use cloud platform
leave cloud maintenance to light sale so
developers can focus on their code
get started today
